title: Culture-TRIP: Culturally-Aware Text-to-Image Generation with Iterative Prompt Refinement
author: Suchae Jeong (Dongguk University), Inseong Choi (Dongguk University), Youngsik Yun (Dongguk University), Jihie Kim (Dongguk University), ...
relevance_why: The method proposed in this paper, especially in terms of iterative prompt refinement based on cultural contexts, could be adapted to audio-language or multimodal contexts where cultural aspects can influence generated outputs.
background: The paper addresses how text-to-image models often fail to accurately generate images based on cultural nouns from underrepresented cultures, leading to misrepresentation.
contribution: Culture-TRIP introduces a novel iterative prompt refinement framework to enhance cultural representation in generated images, achieving a significant 18.84% improvement in alignment with culturally relevant prompts.

technical_comparison.prior_work: Previous text-to-image models lacked sufficient cultural context and were mainly trained on Western-centric datasets, leading to biased outputs.
technical_comparison.novelty: This work refines prompts using a cultural context retrieval process that fetches detailed background and visual information to guide image generation.

key_innovation: The method uniquely harnesses both cultural context and visual details in an iterative feedback loop with large language models to improve image generation for cultural nouns.
real_world_impact: By enhancing cultural representation in AI-generated images, this approach can help mitigate stereotypes and promote better understanding of diverse cultures in media.
limitations: The approach may be limited by the biases present in the training data of the retrieval sources, which can affect cultural representation.

new_terms.culture nouns: **Culture nouns** refer to specific cultural concepts or objects that represent the identity and uniqueness of a culture, often undervalued or overlooked in mainstream datasets.

open_sourcing: Resources can be found at https://shane3606.github.io/Culture-TRIP.
